institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 11 (City/Provincial Committee Expense Resources and Execution)
contents: Article 11 (City/Provincial Committee Expense Resources and Execution) ① Expenses related to City/Provincial Committee projects are covered by the following resources: 1. Local government support budget, 2. Korean Committee's support fund (government Contributions, etc.), 3. Donations, subsidies, support funds, etc. other than those in subparagraphs 1 and 2, ② The expense execution and accounting procedures of city/provincial committees shall be subject to the budget and accounting-related regulations of the Corporation, but shall be subject to paragraph 1, paragraph 1. Regarding the support budget of local governments under subparagraph 1, the budget execution plan and procedures separately determined by the city/provincial committee shall be followed with the approval of the relevant local government., ③ The city/provincial vice chairperson or the city/provincial operation committee chairperson shall ensure smooth expense execution. An accounting manager may be appointed within the scope set by the corporation's accounting regulations. However, when the corporation's accounting regulations are not applied, a separate accounting manager may be designated.
